rules.natural: The Renaissance painting either receives curator approval or receives conservator approval
If the Renaissance painting receives conservator approval, then it is included in the major exhibition
Under the condition that the Renaissance painting receives insurance coverage, then there is no forgery claim against it

Provided that the UV test result does not establish that non-inclusion-after-restoration results in inauthenticity, then the Renaissance painting fails carbon dating analysis
Under the condition that curator approval does not trigger exhibition inclusion, then there is a forgery claim against the Renaissance painting
